column4: how can I connect to a Mac VNC server? all the clients I found in the repositories fail...
sure you enabled vnc support inside the remote-desktop settings of your osx host?
otherwise it will fail for sure - always ;)
yes, other mac users can connect
there is a special option for vnc support inside the remote desktop settings
most clients say they fail because of authentication method not being supported
have you checkeD: VNC viewer may control screen with password ?
thats a setting on your mac
a mac user claims it's enabled
but it only shows part of the screen. the mac has 4 displays attached, i can only see one
